alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 1:11PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Saguache County through 200 PM MDT... At 110 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of North Pass, or 27 miles southwest of Decker Burn Scar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bonanza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
